name: Stud Finder Wall Scanner & Laser Distance Meter, Rechargeable Multifunction Stud Detector with Upgraded Smart Sensor, HD LCD Display and Voice, Digital Laser Distance Measuring Tool 40M/130ft
short_description: [Stud Detection + Laser Distance Measurement]Our multifunctional stud detector not only detects metals (rebar, copper pipes, etc.), cables, and wooden beams hidden behind walls, ceilings, and floors, but also functions as a laser distance meter. It can measure the length, area, and volume of a room, as well as perform addition, subtraction, and volume measurements, eliminating the need for a separate stud detector or laser distance meter.

[Multiple Scanning Modes]The stud finder offers various scanning modes, with a detection depth of up to: Magnetic metals 3.15in (80mm), non-magnetic metals 3.15in (80mm), AC power cables 1.97in (50mm), and wood 1.5in (38mm). Its precise and fast detection saves you time and effort, helping you achieve better results and complete your work faster. Whether you're a professional, a homeowner, or a DIY enthusiast, this stud detector is your best choice.

[Voice Function]When the wall scanner locates a target object, the LCD screen displays the distance and signal strength—closer objects result in stronger signals. If the sound is enabled, it will emit a "beep" (which can be turned off). When the device reaches directly above the target object, the LCD screen will show a center marker, indicating the precise location of the target.

[Multiple Measurement Modes]This laser distance meter can measure distances up to 130FT (40m) and offers up to 12 measurement modes, such as single measurement, continuous measurement, area measurement, volume measurement, Pythagorean measurement, addition and subtraction measurements, and more. It can automatically calculate length, distance, area, and volume, making it ideal for home renovations, as well as large areas such as apartments, warehouses, construction sites, and industrial spaces.

[Unit Switching and 50 Data Records]You can freely switch between measurement units in the settings: M/FT/IN/ft+in. Additionally, this distance meter can store up to 50 sets of measurement results, allowing you to record, compare, and calculate your measurements more efficiently as you work.

[Rechargeable Battery]Equipped with a built-in 390mAh rechargeable battery, it can operate continuously for up to 300 minutes. The charging port uses the most common USB-C interface, so you don’t have to worry about carrying extra cables.

name: Klein Tools ESF100 Electronic Stud Finder and Wall Scanner with Bubble Level, for Wood and Metal Studs, Bright Green LEDs, Batteries Included
short_description: DETECT HIDDEN WOOD AND METAL STUDS: Stud finder accurately detects hidden wood and metal studs up to 1-1/2-Inch deep with auto deep scan
AUDIBLE ALERTS AND LEDs: Clear indication of stud width with bright LEDs and adjustable sound alerts
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Handheld grip with wall-protecting felt pads
CONTINOUS SCANNING: HOLD mode for continuous scanning without trigger depression
BUILT-IN BUBBLE LEVEL: Quick alignment for picture hanging and other tasks with one-handed operation
PRECISE MARKINGS: Top and bottom center indentations allow for precise markings
DURABLE AND READY TO USE: Includes (2) AA batteries and withstands 6.6-Foot (2 m) drops for long-lasting reliability
product_description: Electronic Stud Finder detects hidden wood and metal studs with an auto deep scan capability of up to 1-1/2-Inch. The device offers mutable audible alerts and bright LEDs across the top, clearly indicating the full width of the stud. It features an ergonomic handheld grip, HOLD mode, and withstands a 6.6-Foot (2 m) drop. Felt pads protect walls during use and a bubble vial assists with alignment. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: NOYAFA Stud Finder Wall Scanner,5-in-1High Precision Stud Finder for Wood AC Live Wire Metal Magnetic Studs Detection, HD LCD Display, Automatic Calibration, Audio Alarm, IP54 Waterproof
short_description: Multi-Wall Detector Scanner: Stud finder wall scanner can accurately detects magnetic metal 3.94inches (100mm)/non-magnetic metal 3.15inches (80mm), wood file 1.18inch (30mm), live wire 1.97inch (50mm) in the wall, three modes of switching, the stud finder is the perfect choice for renovation and installation, drilling holes, and circuit troubleshooting detection.

HD LCD Display & Sound Alarm: NF-5101 Stud finder is equipped with a 3.14-inch backlit screen that displays the detected signal strength in real time, a yellow/green/red screen to indicate detection, and a “beeping” alarm when the target is detected, which saves time and effort and makes the task easier to accomplish.

Easy Operation: When the wall stud finder detects metal/wooden beams/live wires, the signal is 100% and a center positioning icon appears on the screen, which is a very practical tool as a gift for family members, friends, DIY enthusiasts, etc.And the wll detector has IP54 waterproof function.

Auto Calibration: Our wall scanner has an automatic calibration function, auto-calibration on power on (“drip” prompt), close to the wall can start scanning, quickly find the center of the wall studs. (Tips to avoid magnetic fields, metal building materials and other interfering factors to ensure reliable results)

Wide Applications: Noyafa NF-5101 wood stud finder is ideal for locating studs, metal, and energized wires hidden behind walls, ceilings and floors. Compatible with a variety of surfaces including drywall, wood floors, acoustical ceilings, painted walls and wallpaper, making it ideal for remodeling, furniture installation and home improvement projects.
Note: Conductive wall coverings or high humidity may reduce wire detection accuracy—ensure surfaces are dry and non-metallic for optimal results.

name: Stud Finder Wall Scanner, 5 in 1 Stud Detector with HD LCD Display for Center and Edge of Wood Metal AC Wire
short_description: Accurate - This MOCITA stud finder SH402 newly upgraded with intelligent micro-sensor chip can locate edge and center of wood, metal, AC wire behind walls, floors and ceilings more accurately and quickly. Base on the internal tests, the accuracy rate is above 97%. It is a must-have for professional, home DIY.

5 in 1 Detection - This stud detector provides 5 modes for accurate needs. 1/2” stud scan mode locates wood and metal studs up to 13mm deep, while 1” mode locates up to 25mm and 1.5” mode locates up to 38mm deep. For best results, always start in mode 1.5” when find studs. Metal scan mode detects metal up to 2.36” (60mm) deep. AC scan mode detects live unshielded AC wires up to 2” (51mm) deep. Press the button "MODE" to switch modes.
Visual Screen & Audio Alarm - This wall scanner comes with HD LCD display and sound alarm, so that you can see when find the objects and hear the beeps whether you are close to the target.

Easy to Use - This wall detector has ergonomic anti-slip handle for comfort and convenient experience which scanning, and easy to read with the LCD display. Press the scan button on the side to calibrate whenever you change mode to reduce errors, ensure that objects behind wall can be detected for reliability.

Wide Use - this stud finder wall scanner can work on different wall surfaces, such as plaster wall, lath, drywall, acoustic ceiling, painted walls, etc. Help you hang TVs, shelves for tools. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any problem with our products, MOCITA will get back to you within 24 hours.

The comprehensive display makes it easy for anyone to use, even in low-light settings. It’s the perfect tool gifts for any DIY enthusiast

Lastly, metal scan mode detects the presence of metal, useful for finding plumbing behind walls. This holiday season, give the gift of peace of mind with a electric stud finder

name: Franklin Sensors ProSensor T6 Stud Finder with 6-Sensors, Wood & Metal Stud Detector/Wall Scanner
short_description: ACCURATE: More sensors = More accuracy. Conventional stud finders have 1 or 2 sensors. The ProSensor T6 has 6, making it the most accurate stud sensing tool on the market. The ProSensor T6 has a max detection depth of 1.5". The precision LEDs track the location of studs while displaying the center and edges simultaneously.

EASY: One mode finds it all! The ProSensor T6 adjusts for a variety of depths, materials and textures. No calibration required. Press and hold the button to begin scanning. Unlike other stud sensors that give false readings, the ProSensor T6 allows you to start scanning anywhere, even over a stud.
DISPLAYS FULL STUDS: The ProSensor T6 displays the center and edges of studs simultaneously, showing single studs that other stud finders cannot detect. Works through drywall/sheetrock and more!
DURABLE: #1 Rated by consumers and professionals, the ProSensor T6 stud finder is both accurate and durable.
MORE INFO: Requires two AAA batteries (not included). Is NOT compatible with rechargeable batteries.

name: Sutekus Stud Finder Wall Scanner 5 in 1 Electronic Stud Detector with LCD Display and Audio Alarm Stud Sensor Beam Finders for Wood Metal Studs and AC Wire Detection
short_description: Sutekus stud finder can quickly and easily locate wood studs metal pipes and live AC wires behind walls, floors and ceilings. Package includes 1 x stud finder, 1 x 9V battery, 1 x user manual. Please install the battery before using.
This stud finder features 5 Modes: Stud Modes with 3 depths - 1/2", 1" & 1-1/2"; Metal Mode with 2-3/8" scan depth; and AC Mode detects live unshielded AC wires up to 2".
Live AC wire detection works in all modes to avoid safety hazards, when unshielded wires are detected, AC wire warning icon will appear on the screen and indicator above the screen will turn red.

Large LCD screen is for easy reading. Beep alarm help you to locate the center of a stud easily and quickly. Perfect tool to help you find the right spot for installing TVs, cabinets, shelves, hanging pictures and other home DIY projects.
Easy to use: select the mode you want to use, then calibrate it before every scan, then scan the wall till the signal bar is full and the alarm beeps, you have found the center of the stud.

name: Stud Finder Wall Scanner - Upgraded 6-in-1 Digital Stud Sensor for Wood, Metal, and AC Wire Detection – Deep Scan 1-1/2" Drywall Plaster Locator - Ochre Yellow
short_description: Open New Fields with the Stud Finder: Drilling into a wall is easy, but it can be dangerous if you don't know what's behind it. The stud finder can help you avoid hidden dangers, such as electrical wires or metal pipes behind drywall during home improvement projects. The 6-in-1 stud detector equipped with upgraded sensors and an HD LCD digital screen, provides more accurate and clearly visible results. Its gear-shaped body design also helps you easily mark the drilling center position

Secure Mounts and Decorations with Confidence: In stud detection mode, the stud finder scanner locates the center of wooden studs behind drywall in living rooms, bedrooms, and more. You can easily switch between three detection depths (1/2 in, 1 in, 1 1/2 in) to accommodate different drywall thicknesses. This feature is perfect for safely hanging and installing TV mounts, photo frames, wall cabinets, brackets, shelves, mirrors, handles, and even holiday or birthday decorations on drywall

Avoid Metal Pipes Behind the Drywall: In metal mode, the magnetic detection function helps identify non-ferrous metals like copper pipes (maximum depth: 2.4in) and ferrous metals like iron pipes (maximum depth: 3.2in). The advanced metal depth digital display function helps predict the depth of detected metals

Switch to AC Mode When the Wire Icon Appears: When using the wall scanner, no matter which mode you're in, switch to AC mode immediately for further wire detection if the wire icon appears. Please turn on the power when using the stud finder to detect; turn off the power when drilling. Note that the thickness of the insulation layer surrounding the wire and the strength of the voltage may impact detection results

Creative Gift Ideas for Home DIYers: Faster calibration, more accurate readings, nicer build quality make this stud finder better be unique gifts for men dad husband uncle and friends. Great birthday Christmas valentines day gifts for him. A Must have for tool box

Warm Tips: Before each use, please ensure that you have pressed the Scan Button to calibrate the product. For detailed instructions, refer to the operation guide on the product page or in the user manual

name: Zircon StudSensor A100 Wall Scanner and Center/Edge Locating Stud Finder with WireWarning Detection
short_description: WireWarning Detection indicates the presence of live, unshielded electrical AC wiring while scanning in StudScan and DeepScan modes.
Patented "Over the Stud" Indicator and SpotLite Pointing System ensure the A100 provides trustworthy results
Ergonomically designed grip allows a comfortable hold on the tool for any size hand, at any angle
One fully charged 9V battery, not included, is required for the stud scanner to run at optimal performance to help you easily find studs and avoid hazards
product_description: The StudSensor A100 is Zircon’s newest edge locating electronic stud finder that is sold exclusively on Amazon. The A100 is designed with a smooth, ergonomic rubber grip allowing for a comfortable yet secure hold for any size hand, at any angle. This stud finder uses the most recent technology in density detecting software and circuitry. The scanner has 2 scanning modes to locate the edges of wood and metal studs and joists behind walls, floors, and in ceilings up to 1.5 inches (38 mm) deep. In StudScan Mode, the SS A100 locates the edges of shallower wood or metal studs up to 0.75 of an inch (19 mm) deep. Switch over to DeepScan Mode to double the scanning depth to 1.5 inches (38 mm). This stud sensor is programmed with a WireWarning Detection feature that indicates the presence of live unshielded electrical wires up to 2 inches (50 mm) deep when using either stud scanning modes. Finding studs using this edge finding tool is simple. To get started, install one brand new 9V alkaline battery (not included). Place the unit flat against the wall and press the Power Button to calibrate the sensor. Once you hear a beep indicating calibration is complete, continue to hold the Power Button and slowly slide the tool across the surface. The easy-to-read LCD will alert you as the stud detector approaches the edge of the stud in both scanning modes. Once the edge is detected, the patented arrow-shaped SpotLite Pointer will shine, the translucent base will illuminate, and an audio tone will sound. DO NOT DRILL HERE! Instead, mark the spot in the “V’ marker groove at the head of the tool and continue past the stud. Repeat the process in the opposite direction and mark the opposite edge of the stud. The center of the stud is midway between the two marks. Make sure to note whether the WireWarning Detection is alerting you to live, unshielded AC wiring before drilling between the two marks into the center of the stud. With the Zircon StudSensor A100, you can safely maneuver through the most complicated of projects with the professional confidence that comes from owning a Zircon.
